channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's tariffs deadline is looming for Europe. Here's where things stand
item.description: The U.S. and the European Union have not yet struck a trade deal with just days to go before Trump's tariff reprieve is set to end.

item.title: The one thing that’s driving home sellers bananas — and making buyers happy
House narrowly passes Trump's megabill in major victory for Republicans
item.description: President Donald Trump worked the phones late into the night to help House Republican leadership deliver his second-term policy agenda.

item.title: Trump’s big bill just passed the House. Here are its winners and losers.
Trump's megabill is in real trouble, as House GOP defectors vote 'no' on advancing it
item.description: Speaker Mike Johnson can lose just three members' votes and still pass the bill in a party-line vote. But more than a dozen Republicans are currently ...

item.title: Will Trump’s megabill cut your taxes? Check this number on your tax return.
Time is running out to buy an EV before Trump’s big bill kills $7,500 tax credit
5 huge changes coming for student-loan borrowers and colleges under GOP megabill
Trump speaks with Putin after U.S. pauses some weapons shipments to Ukraine
item.description: The Trump-Putin call comes after the U.S. said it would halt some weapons shipments to Ukraine, which continues to fight off invading Russian forces.

item.title: Trump says U.S. struck trade deal with Vietnam that imposes 20% tariff on its imports
item.description: Vietnam, whose exports to the U.S. reportedly comprised 30% of its gross domestic product last year, is especially vulnerable to Trump's tariffs.
